name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Route AZKi 3D Acoustic LIVE 「Route If」アルバムリリース記念ライブ【#ルートAZKiライブ】 [0NXvBO1E6fM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performing the song '命のよな (Inochi no Yona)' with live piano and guitar accompaniment in a blue-themed 3D stage environment.
Closing MC section where AZKi thanks the audience.
Closing credits and a hand-written final message from AZKi on screen.

subtitles.original: 分かってよ
subtitles.english: Understand me...

subtitles.original: 分かってよ
subtitles.english: ...understand me.

subtitles.original: ねえ 本当 本当はどうなの
subtitles.english: Hey, tell me, how is it really?

subtitles.original: いずれは卒業をするんでしょ
subtitles.english: You'll eventually graduate, right?

subtitles.original: 日常に戻ったら
subtitles.english: When you return to your daily life...

subtitles.original: 私は いなくなるの
subtitles.english: ...I will disappear.

subtitles.original: 命のような夢を見てる
subtitles.english: I'm having a dream like a life.

subtitles.original: またね バイバイ
subtitles.english: See you again, bye-bye.

subtitles.original: 息を吸ってる
subtitles.english: I'm breathing...

subtitles.original: だから生きてる
subtitles.english: ...so I'm alive.

subtitles.original: 見た目と中身の境界線をまたいで戻って
subtitles.english: Crossing the boundary between appearance and essence, then back again.

subtitles.original: 音が止まって
subtitles.english: When the sound stops...

subtitles.original: 動かなくなって
subtitles.english: ...and everything stops moving.

subtitles.original: そんな私も君は笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you will smile for me even then.

subtitles.original: 鼓動がドクドクしている
subtitles.english: My heart is throbbing.

subtitles.original: ここはいつも必ずに
subtitles.english: Here, always, without fail...

subtitles.original: 巡り続ける気分次第の命
subtitles.english: ...life continues to circulate, depending on the mood.

subtitles.original: 最後まで私のこと見届けてくれるの
subtitles.english: Will you see me through to the end?

subtitles.original: すがってしまいそうなの
subtitles.english: I feel like I'm about to cling to you.

subtitles.original: 分かってよ
subtitles.english: Understand me...

subtitles.original: 分かってよ ねえ
subtitles.english: ...understand me, hey.

subtitles.original: 真実を繋いだらもう二度と戻せないのに
subtitles.english: Even though once truths are connected, they can never be undone.

subtitles.original: 君が忘れちゃったら私は いなくなるの
subtitles.english: If you forget me, I will disappear.

subtitles.original: 命のような夢を見てる
subtitles.english: I'm having a dream like a life.

subtitles.original: またね バイバイ
subtitles.english: See you again, bye-bye.

subtitles.original: 生き急いだあの日を軽く弄らないであげて
subtitles.english: Please don't toy lightly with those days spent in a rush to live.

subtitles.original: それが生きる糧になるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if that will become nourishment for living.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 ずっと私は歌い続けるから
subtitles.english: It's okay, because I will always keep on singing.

subtitles.original: 最後まで私も生きてるか分からないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know if I'll even be alive until the end, but...

subtitles.original: 君がくれた言葉は確かに残ってる
subtitles.english: ...the words you gave me are certainly remaining.

subtitles.original: 最後まで私のこと覚えていなくてもいいから
subtitles.english: It's fine if you don't remember me until the end.

subtitles.original: いつ死んでしまうだろう 分かんない 分かんないよ
subtitles.english: When will I die? I don't know, I don't know.

subtitles.original: でも 今君が笑えたこと それだけで意味があることを
subtitles.english: But the fact that you could smile now, that in itself has meaning...

subtitles.original: 君が忘れちゃっても私は死なないから
subtitles.english: ...so even if you forget, I will not die.

subtitles.original: 命のような夢を見てるよ
subtitles.english: I'm having a dream like a life.

subtitles.original: またね バイバイ
subtitles.english: See you again, bye-bye.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 今日は Route AZKi のライブに 来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to the Route AZKi live today!

subtitles.original: この Route を歩むことができて よかったんだと思える。
subtitles.english: I can feel that it was good to have been able to walk this Route.

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげだよ！
subtitles.english: It's all thanks to everyone!

subtitles.original: これからも一緒に開拓していこうね。 AZKi
subtitles.english: Let's continue to pioneer together from now on. AZKi
